duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing general and preventative maintenance repairs including carpentry, plumbing, painting, electrical repair, appliance repair, HVAC, masonry, and other general maintenance duties in accordance with company standards and local building codes.
Completing maintenance service requests (work orders) for the apartment community in a competent, professional, and courteous manner.
Assisting in maintaining inventory by properly monitoring and recording inventory items.
Providing information to the Property Management Staff regarding safety concerns and the general appearance of the community.
Assisting in on-call maintenance and performing other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required (trade certification preferred)
